items.title: User Activity Sharing
items.description: Enable users to share their workout activities with friends within the app.
acceptance_criteria: Users can post completed workouts to a social feed.
Friends can view, like, and comment on shared activities.
non_functional: Feed updates should load within 2 seconds

items.title: Friends and Following System
items.description: Allow users to connect with others by sending and accepting friend requests or following profiles.
acceptance_criteria: Users can search for others by username or email.
Users can send, accept, or decline friend requests.
non_functional: Search results should return within 1 second
System should handle up to 1 million user profiles

notes: The requirement is broad; assumptions made include that social features will include activity sharing and friend connections. Further clarification needed on privacy settings and integration with external social networks.
